languages.text: "Драйвстемы — древний губернаторский род Даргонуса. Несложно догадаться, что чем богаче протекторат фон Валанциус, тем меньше свободного места и в их сокровищнице. Их репутация безупречна — кроме одной детали: у нас есть свидетельства того, что конкурентов Урбенда регулярно постигают несчастья в виде рейдов ксеносов. На мой вкус, эти нападения происходят слишком удачно для Драйвстемов, но железных доказательств у нас нет — и, возможно, они никогда не появятся".

traits.locale_text: "Драйвстемы — древний губернаторский род Даргонуса. Несложно догадаться, что чем богаче торговая империя фон Валанциус, тем меньше свободного места и в их сокровищнице. Их репутация безупречна — кроме одной детали: у нас есть свидетельства того, что конкурентов Урбенда регулярно постигают несчастья в виде рейдов ксеносов. На мой вкус, эти нападения происходят слишком удачно для Драйвстемов, но железных доказательств у нас нет — и, возможно, они никогда не появятся".

languages.text: "The Drivestems are the ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius protectorate, the fuller their coffers grow. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend Drivestem's rivals seem to have the misfortune of regularly falling victim to xenos raids. I find that these attacks are always a little too advantageous for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."
languages.original_text: "Драйвстемы — древний губернаторский род Даргонуса. Несложно догадаться, что чем богаче протекторат фон Валанциус, тем меньше свободного места и в их сокровищнице. Их репутация безупречна — кроме одной детали: у нас есть свидетельства того, что конкурентов Урбенда регулярно постигают несчастья в виде рейдов ксеносов. На мой вкус, эти нападения происходят слишком удачно для Драйвстемов, но железных доказательств у нас нет — и, возможно, они никогда не появятся".

traits.locale_text: "The Drivestems are an ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius empire, the less empty space there is in their coffers. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend's rivals run into xenos raids on a regular basis. I find that these attacks are always a little too fortunate for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

"The Drivestems are an ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius empire, the less empty space there is in their coffers. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend's rivals run into xenos raids on a regular basis. I find that these attacks are always a little too fortunate for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

"The Drivestems are the ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius trade empire, the fuller their coffers grow. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend Drivestem's rivals seem to have the misfortune of regularly falling victim to xenos raids. I find that these attacks are always a little too advantageous for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

"The Drivestems are the ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius trade empire, the fuller their coffers grow. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend Drivestem's rivals seem to have the misfortune of regularly falling victim to xenos raids. I find that these attacks are always a little too advantageous for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

"The Drivestems are the ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius protectorate, the fuller their coffers grow. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend Drivestem's rivals seem to have the misfortune of regularly falling victim to xenos raids. I find that these attacks are always a little too advantageous for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

languages.text: “德莱夫斯塔家族是达戈努斯古老的执政家族。可以预见的是，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的属地越是富庶，他们的金库便越是充盈。他们的声誉毫无瑕疵，只不过有个小问题——我们有证据表明，厄本·德莱夫斯塔的竞争对手似乎运气不佳，他们总是会成为异形袭击的受害者。我认为，这些袭击对德莱夫斯塔家族而言，实在是有点过于有利了，但我们缺乏确凿的证据，而且这些证据恐怕永远都不会浮出水面。”
languages.original_text: "The Drivestems are the ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius protectorate, the fuller their coffers grow. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend Drivestem's rivals seem to have the misfortune of regularly falling victim to xenos raids. I find that these attacks are always a little too advantageous for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

traits.locale_text: “德莱夫斯塔家族是达戈努斯古老的执政家族。可以预见的是，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的属地越是富庶，他们的金库便越是充盈。他们的声誉毫无瑕疵，只不过有个小问题——我们有证据表明，厄本·德莱夫斯塔的竞争对手似乎运气不佳，他们总是会成为异形袭击的受害者。我认为，这些袭击对德莱夫斯塔家族而言，实在是有点过于有利了，但我们缺乏确凿的证据，而且这些证据恐怕永远都不会浮出水面。”

languages.text: «Los Drivestem son la casa que gobierna Dargonus desde hace mucho tiempo. Como cabría esperar, la prosperidad del protectorado von Valancius nutre sus arcas. Su reputación es perfecta, excepto por un detalle. Tenemos pruebas de que los rivales de Urbend Drivestem son víctima de incursiones xenos con una frecuencia inusitada. Siempre he pensado que estos ataques son demasiado ventajosos para los Drivestem, pero no tenemos pruebas fehacientes... y dudo que lleguemos a obtenerlas».
languages.original_text: "The Drivestems are the ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius protectorate, the fuller their coffers grow. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend Drivestem's rivals seem to have the misfortune of regularly falling victim to xenos raids. I find that these attacks are always a little too advantageous for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

traits.locale_text: «Los Drivestem son la casa que gobierna Dargonus desde hace mucho tiempo. Como cabría esperar, la prosperidad del protectorado von Valancius nutre sus arcas. Su reputación es perfecta, excepto por un detalle. Tenemos pruebas de que los rivales de Urbend Drivestem son víctima de incursiones xenos con una frecuencia inusitada. Siempre he pensado que estos ataques son demasiado ventajosos para los Drivestem, pero no tenemos pruebas fehacientes... y dudo que lleguemos a obtenerlas».

languages.text: 「ドライブステム家はダルゴナスで古くから総督を務めてきた家になります。お気づきのとおり、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の保護領が有する富が増えるにつれ、総督家の蓄えも充実していきます。評判は、一点を除いて非の打ち所がありません―アーベント・ドライブステムの対抗相手が、不運にも定期的に異種族の襲撃の的となっているようなのです。こうした襲撃が常にドライブステム家に有利に働きすぎていることには気づきましたが、確かな証拠がありません。今後も表面化することは恐らくないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The Drivestems are the ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius protectorate, the fuller their coffers grow. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend Drivestem's rivals seem to have the misfortune of regularly falling victim to xenos raids. I find that these attacks are always a little too advantageous for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブステム家はダルゴナスで古くから総督を務めてきた家になります。お気づきのとおり、フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の保護領が有する富が増えるにつれ、総督家の蓄えも充実していきます。評判は、一点を除いて非の打ち所がありません―アーベント・ドライブステムの対抗相手が、不運にも定期的に異種族の襲撃の的となっているようなのです。こうした襲撃が常にドライブステム家に有利に働きすぎていることには気づきましたが、確かな証拠がありません。今後も表面化することは恐らくないでしょう」

languages.text: "Die Drivestems sind das angestammte Gouverneurshaus von Dargonus. Und je wohlhabender das Protektorat von Valancius ist, desto voller sind auch ihre Kassen. Ihr Ruf ist tadellos, bis auf eine Kleinigkeit – uns liegen Hinweise vor, dass die Rivalen von Urbend Drivestem regelmäßig das Pech haben, Xenos-Angriffen zum Opfer zu fallen. Für meinen Geschmack bringen diese Angriffe den Drivestems stets zu viele Vorteile, aber wir haben keine echten Beweise – falls es überhaupt welche gibt."
languages.original_text: "The Drivestems are the ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius protectorate, the fuller their coffers grow. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend Drivestem's rivals seem to have the misfortune of regularly falling victim to xenos raids. I find that these attacks are always a little too advantageous for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

traits.locale_text: "Die Drivestems sind das angestammte Gouverneurshaus von Dargonus. Und je wohlhabender das Protektorat von Valancius ist, desto voller sind auch ihre Kassen. Ihr Ruf ist tadellos, bis auf eine Kleinigkeit – uns liegen Hinweise vor, dass die Rivalen von Urbend Drivestem regelmäßig das Pech haben, Xenos-Angriffen zum Opfer zu fallen. Für meinen Geschmack bringen diese Angriffe den Drivestems stets zu viele Vorteile, aber wir haben keine echten Beweise – falls es überhaupt welche gibt."

languages.text: « Les Drivestem sont la maison gouvernante de Dargonus. Sans surprise, plus le protectorat von Valancius prospère, et plus leurs coffres se remplissent. Ils jouissent d'une excellente réputation, à une exception près : les rivaux d'Urbend Drivestem ont la fâcheuse tendance de tomber victime de raids xénos. Ces attaques tombent toujours à un moment opportun pour les Drivestem, mais nous n'avons hélas aucune preuve tangible de leur implication... et je crains que nous n'en trouvions jamais. »
languages.original_text: "The Drivestems are the ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius protectorate, the fuller their coffers grow. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend Drivestem's rivals seem to have the misfortune of regularly falling victim to xenos raids. I find that these attacks are always a little too advantageous for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

traits.locale_text: « Les Drivestem sont la maison gouvernante de Dargonus. Sans surprise, plus le protectorat von Valancius prospère, et plus leurs coffres se remplissent. Ils jouissent d'une excellente réputation, à une exception près : les rivaux d'Urbend Drivestem ont la fâcheuse tendance de tomber victime de raids xénos. Ces attaques tombent toujours à un moment opportun pour les Drivestem, mais nous n'avons hélas aucune preuve tangible de leur implication... et je crains que nous n'en trouvions jamais. »

languages.text: "Drivestemler, Dargonus'un en eski vali hanesidir. Von Valancius protektorasının serveti büyüdükçe onların da kasalarının dolduğunu tahmin etmek zor değil. İtibarları kusursuzdur. Tek bir detay dışında: Urbend Drivestem'in talihsiz rakiplerinin düzenli olarak zeno akınlarına kurban gittiğini görüyoruz. Bu saldırıların hep Drivestemlere biraz fazla avantaj sağladığını düşünmüşümdür. Ancak elimizde somut kanıt yok, asla olmayabilir de."
languages.original_text: "The Drivestems are the ancient governor house of Dargonus. Predictably, the greater the wealth of the von Valancius protectorate, the fuller their coffers grow. Their reputation is flawless except for one detail — we have evidence that Urbend Drivestem's rivals seem to have the misfortune of regularly falling victim to xenos raids. I find that these attacks are always a little too advantageous for the Drivestems, but we lack solid proof — and it might never surface."

traits.locale_text: "Drivestemler, Dargonus'un en eski yönetici hanesidir. Von Valancius protektorasının serveti büyüdükçe onların da kasalarının dolduğunu tahmin etmek zor değil. İtibarları kusursuzdur. Tek bir detay dışında: Urbend Drivestem'in talihsiz rakiplerinin düzenli olarak zeno akınlarına kurban gittiklerine dair elimizde bilgiler var. Bu saldırıların hep Drivestemlere biraz fazla avantaj sağladığını düşünmüşümdür ancak elimizde somut bir kanıt yok ve asla olmayabilir de."
